name: Ultimate Impact
description: Improve the lives of underrepresented youth through the sport and community of ultimate.
fullDescription: Improve the lives of underrepresented youth through the sport and community of ultimate.
whatTheyOffer: Ultimate Impact uses the team sport of Ultimate Frisbee as the framework for providing youth with increased opportunities, confidence, communication abilities, and conflict-resolution skills. Through weekly training sessions, peer interaction, and consistent adult mentorship, Ultimate Impact creates a positive environment for youth to have fun, be active, improve athletic skills, and build community through the concept of a team.
